nodes.text: A star system contained Torn Station, a refueling station that various slavers, pirates, and smugglers had hideouts on. The system was filled with tumbling asteroids and comets.

The system was located in the Mytaranor sector, a part of the Kashyyyk Region in the Slice section of the Mid Rim. A hyperlane called the Great Kashyyyk Branch connected Torn Station and the system to the Kashyyyk and Quas Killam systems.
The system that held Torn Station was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the system in the grid square P-10.
